name: Potion Novice
description:
You are a wizard with an interesting fantasy subject behind bars. Make potions and try them out on your subject in the room on the left. Each potion will affect the subject differently.

Controls:

  • Movement: WSAD or Arrows
  • Items:
    • Pick up - E
    • Drop - Q
    • Throw - R
  • Interact: F
    • Leave - Esc

Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1
